content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "browse_website" command to visit the AllTrails website and search for hiking trails near me. The website provided information on hiking trails in various locations, including Brno and other regions in the Czech Republic. The app offers a variety of features, including verified trails, offline maps, and community reviews. It also promotes environmental conservation through partnerships with organizations like Leave No Trace and One Tree Planted. However, I was unable to install the AllTrails app using the "execute_shell" command. I tried to install the app again using the same command but received the same error message. I used the "google" command to search for hiking trails near me and received a list of websites. I used the "browse_website" command again to search for hiking trails near me on the AllTrails website. The website provided information on hiking trails in various locations, including Brno, South Moravian, Czech Republic. The app offers a variety of trail options for different activities and abilities, and includes features such as offline maps and wrong-turn alerts. AllTrails+ membership includes additional planning features and supports environmental causes.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "print(\\"Hello, world!\\")", "name": "hello_world.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: Hello, world!\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "potential_hiking_trails.txt", "text": "1. Brno Reservoir Trail\\n2. Moravian Karst\\n3. P\\u00e1lava Hills\\n4. Jesen\\u00edky Mountains\\n5. Krkono\\u0161e National Park\\n6. \\u0160umava National Park"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
